column2: Enchanté mademoiselle, je m'appelle Armoise.
Inquire;Propose;Compliment
Whatever, Phostnack here.
I can't 'elp but wonder what your majestìque bodì is made of, mon chéri.
I believe we should dàns together to thìs lounge musìque. Slowlì, charminglì, passionatelì...
Your turquoise bodì is ...oh so very delicatlì shinì, marvellouslì sparklìng... Je suis captiveted.
And you'll keep being that way, 'mon chéri'. Wondering, that is.
And I believe we should not. Here's a stalemate for you.
Some people are lucky, I just so happen to be one of them.
Sacré bleu, is something troublìng your days, darlìng? I can hear you out ma fille, you onlì need to ask.
Oh, but I'm redì to do whatevèr you ask of me for that answer, you see.
You're very mystèrious... Armoise, he likes mystèrious.
Well, if I pay close attention to it there is one small thing that's troubling me: it's you.
I do. How about some floobing then? I can giggle and you'd dribble my bells, then we'd wobble and bobble and...
But Phostnack doesn't like Armoise.
Oh, why so? Are you perhaps insecure of your skìlls?
Don't be shy chéri I'll guide you.
Very determìnd... Armoise, he likes determìnd.
Actually I simply find you repulsive.
So guide me then!
But Phostnack doesn't like Armoise.
I can't help but wonder what your majestìque bodì is made of, mon chéri.
I believe we should dàns together to thìs lounge musìque. Slowlì, charminglì, passionatelì...
Some other people like confidence, as it happens I'm one of them.
It's made of sugar, Armoise, do you want some?
And dancing it shall be.
That's nice of you to say.
Inquire;Propose;Compliment
Enchanté monsieur, je m'appelle Armoise
H-Hello, I'm Demolitos... but my friends call me Demmy!
Why are you carrìng those menacìng and 'eavy axes in an élevateur mon chéri?
Demmì, what a cute name. Can I touch your axes mon chéri?
Those are verì... wide shoulders Demmì. Armoise, he likes wide shoulders.
I... I'm a warrior.
NO! I-I'm sorry... they were a present for my e-eighth birthday... Grandma made them!
I... eheh... thank you!
Oh, I wonder what terrible catastrophe may have pushed you to become one, mon sweet Demmì.
Oh, then we should tussle! Come here mon strong warrior!
You look verì strong indeed! Armoise, he likes strong.
C-catastrophe? No! I just want to be the stro-strongest warrior!
Ah! -Tuff, Ponf- Oh!
I... uh... thank you!
Oh! How verì nice of her, and you got your majestìque shoulders swinging them, didn't you?
Oh! How verì nice of her, show me how powerful you swing them mon chéri!
You have verì wide shoulders mon chèrì. Armoise, he likes wide shoulders.
Eheh... yes I did.
Ah. Oh. UuuuOh!
I... eheh... thank you!
That's very cute of you Demmì, I wonder what you destinatiòn may be.
Oh, then we should tussle right now! Come here mon strong warrior!
You're very ambitious Demmì. Armoise, he likes ambitious.
I... well... the second floor.
Ah! -Tuff, Ponf- Oh!
Oh... uh... I... eheh.

Bark, sure.
Bark!
Woof! Woof!
Anf anf anf anf anf.
Whatever, goodbye.
You want to put what?! where?!
Ooh, that's a-d-o-r-a-b-l-e!
Bark!
Woof! Woof!
Anf anf anf anf anf.
Between elbow and... that's outrageous! I'm in!
Inside the ear? At the same TIME?!
Let's do that, now!

Ah! It is nice to meet you Mr. President!
Bark!

Anf anf anf anf anf.
I-I will do it, but only because it's you asking. Protect me, Grandma!
W-what are you talking about!?! Protect me, Grandma!
You met Grandma?!
Bark!
Woof! Woof!
Anf anf anf anf anf.
I... that is too much Mr. President.
I-in front of... ?! *Demolitos passes out*
Yes, Mr. President.
Bark!
Woof! Woof!
Anf anf anf anf anf.
If Grandma said so, I will.
Amuseland?! Just let me pack my things!
Ice-cream?! Yes! I'll be there! Tomorrow, 3:00 AM at the park!
Inquire;Propose;Compliment
Sacré bleu, I wasn't expecting you! It feels like an era already passed by.
You finallì grew tired of that summer love of yours, didn't you?
I still reminisce about caressing your strong legs like I did back then, they left a splinter in my heart.
To this day I keep your flowerì cloths neatlì folded under my pillow, and with every night, I dream of you.
You made the right choice, I always despised that sofa. Does your 'eart have a new home now?
I still reminisce about caressing your strong legs like I did back then, they left a splinter in my heart.
To this day I keep your flowerì cloths neatlì folded under my pillow, and with every night, I dream of you.

Don't know. How 'bout making out?
Uh! ... what? I... My name is Demolitos.
And I'm Meryl sweetheart, how'd you like some tickling? *giggle*
And I'm Meryl sweetheart. Good, now we know each other. Time to make out?
And I'm Meryl sweetheart. So, you got some preatty nice crotchbelts going for you there.
Ihih... not there... ehehehe.... stop stop! Ahahahahahahhahah!
I... would... I mean... what?!
Thanks! I got them from an orc my Grandma killed.
You would? What are we waiting for? *smooch*
Make out, as to nack. Skrewl. Play. Shak. Vang, you understand, don't you? Smeep with.
So, you're the shy one. I can handle that. *smirk*
Ah... what are you... Oh! Not there... ohohohoh...
S-smeep... with?!?! Protect me, Grandma!
Eheh...
Let's play arm wrestling. If I win, we make out!
Really? Let me take a closer look!
Nice biceps, and look at those legs.
I never lost at arm wrestling.
Sure. Hey, what are you? Ihih... not there... ehehehe.... stop! or, don't stop!
Play;Suggest;Approve
I've got a couple ideas... *smirk*
Oh, you got ideas? W-o-a, that is simply a-m-a-z-i-n-g. Honestly, who the nack are you?
I'm Meryl. Truth or Dare?
I'm Meryl. Can you take any shape?
I'm Meryl. That's a nice hat! You got style sis!
Let me be, Meryl.
Being Phostnack, I obviously can. Why do you ask?
Thanks, I appreciate those that can tell. I'm Phostnack and, by the way, you've got captivating eyes.
Let's play "What am I?".
Can you take the form of a magic wand? I got some neat magic tricks to show you. *smirk*
Sweet! Show me something!
Ahah, why not? That can be fun... "What am I?"
Daah, I can take any shape, see? Ehy! What are you? Ooh, not so fast! Wait! No, keep it up, keep it up!
I can do THIS! ... aand... THIS! ... aand ... THAT! ... aand ...

Phostnack! You're all pink, are you feeling ok? Let me check you out, I'm a professional. *smirk*
Phostnack, how about a no pants dance?
Ehy! What are you? Ooh, not so fast! Wait! No, keep it up, keep it up!
"No pants dance"? Let me be.
These eyes, I can't resist them.

I'm sorry but I didn't steal her from you, that sofa already wanted to leave you.
Seventyfive, than she couldn't take it anymore. You up for some table tennis?
You look so rough, I can sand you if you want...
True, but she also told me you're a very steardy lover. I wonder how it'd feel. *smirk*
